name: Cloud City
description:
Cloud City is a Visual Novel-type Intimacy/Friendship Simulator in which you play as a new resident to the mysterious Cloud City - and despite the cobbled and strung together structure to the community, make a connections and find a genuine closeness in your new home.

CREDITS:

Jam Graham - Moderator

Lula Ochoa

Worsey

Nathan Sonenfeld

Carla Lopez

Kanoa Kyra Ichiyanagi

Kai Tucker

Bryce Pierce

PRODUCERS:

Vincent De La Torre, Marley Townsend, Roy Berardo, Theo Vaillant

You can listen to the soundtrack from this game and other CalArts Game Makers titles here!
